mapper.select: SELECT option_code AS "optionCode", option_name AS "optionName" FROM purchse_option po JOIN purchse_goods pg ON (po.goods_num = pg.goods_num) WHERE pg.company_num = #{companyNum} AND pg.goods_name LIKE '%' || #{goodsName} || '%' ORDER BY 2
SELECT bhf_id AS "bhfId", bhf_name AS "bhfName" FROM bsn_bhf WHERE company_num = #{companyNum} ORDER BY 2
